        public com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getOp1Counter()

        op1Counter as database reference

      • setButtons

        public void setButtons​(Button op1,
                       Button op2,
                       Button op3)
        Sets buttons for GameActivity. Allows option texts to change when new question is retrieved from Firebase.

        This method is called after new GetFirebase class has been created in GameActivity.java
